summary: Ran the CLAUDE.md autonomous workflow across multiple context windows. Completed 5 board items (2 issues implemented with PRs, 3 triaged as already done). Ready queue emptied.

issues_processed.title: Add component flip horizontal/vertical
issues_processed.notes: Full MVC implementation: model (flip_h/flip_v fields, terminal transform), controller (flip_component method + observer), view (paint transform, keyboard shortcuts F/Shift+F, context menu, Edit menu entries), tests (model + controller).

issues_processed.title: Remove unused multi-algorithm pathfinding code
issues_processed.notes: Deleted algorithm_layers.py (220 LOC), layer_control_widget.py (214 LOC). Removed A* and Dijkstra classes from path_finding.py. Cleaned dead branches from circuit_canvas.py.

issues_processed.title: Waveform source crash
issues_processed.notes: Issue comments indicated already fixed by jefriedrichsen. Moved from Ready to In Review on board.

issues_processed.title: Properties panel bug
issues_processed.notes: Issue comments indicated already fixed. Moved from Ready to In Review on board.

issues_processed.title: GUI dialog tests
issues_processed.notes: Issue already closed on GitHub but still showing as Ready on board. Moved to Done.

strengths.detail: Critical bugs first, then by priority field and issue number. Kept work focused and predictable.
The model-controller-view pattern made feature implementation (issue #113) very structured. Each layer is independently testable.
Empty Ready queue stop condition works correctly. Prevents overreach into Backlog.
Branch-per-issue + PR + board movement + hours logging gives full audit trail.

friction_points.detail: `gh issue view <N>` fails with 'Projects (classic) is being deprecated' GraphQL error. Must use `gh issue view <N> --json title,body,labels,comments` instead.
friction_points.suggestion: Add `--json` flag guidance to CLAUDE.md board commands section.

friction_points.detail: 3 separate gh calls + JSON parsing every session start. IDs rarely change unless someone edits field options.
friction_points.suggestion: Allow MEMORY.md cached IDs with a 're-query if mutation fails' fallback. Add a note to CLAUDE.md.

friction_points.detail: Issues #23, #26, #103 were marked Ready but already fixed/closed. No workflow rule for this case â€” had to make judgment calls.
friction_points.suggestion: Add triage rule: 'If issue comments indicate completion or issue is closed, move to In Review/Done and skip.'

friction_points.detail: Removing ~870 LOC from path_finding.py required multiple correction passes. Initial edit left duplicate class bodies.
friction_points.suggestion: For large deletions, prefer multiple small targeted edits over one massive replacement. Or use file rewrite when >50% of content changes.

friction_points.detail: Session spanned multiple context windows (compaction occurred). Lost some intermediate state.
friction_points.suggestion: Commit more frequently as checkpoints. Use MEMORY.md to record in-progress state before context runs low.

suggested_claude_md_changes.change: Add note: use `gh issue view <N> --json title,body,labels,comments` instead of bare `gh issue view <N>` to avoid Projects Classic deprecation errors.
Add step between 2 and 3: 'If issue comments indicate it is already resolved or the issue is closed, move to In Review/Done and skip to next Ready item.'
Add row: 'Stale Ready item (already fixed/closed) | Move to In Review/Done, pick next Ready item'

commands_used.description: Bash command patterns used during autonomous workflow, suitable for settings.json allowedTools

test_results.error_note: 46 errors are pre-existing GUI dialog tests (test_analysis_dialog.py, test_component_palette.py, test_properties_panel.py, test_waveform_config_dialog.py) that fail due to Qt display server issues in headless environment. Present on main branch.
